Item ID21969

Diamond dragon bolts are a type of crossbow ammo requiring a Ranged level of 64 to wield. It is created by attaching diamond bolt tips to dragon bolts. Doing so requires a Fletching level of 84, granting 7 Fletching experience per bolt.

They are enchanted via the Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond) spell by a player with level 57 Magic, enchanting 10 bolts per cast. This creates enchanted diamond dragon bolts, which are a superior version of enchanted diamond bolts.

[[File:Diamond dragon bolts detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Diamond dragon bolts''' are a type of [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] [[Bolts|ammo]] requiring a [[Ranged]] level of 64 to wield. It is created by attaching [[diamond bolt tips]] to [[dragon bolts]]. Doing so requires a Fletching level of 84, granting 7 Fletching experience per bolt.

They are enchanted via the [[Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond)]] spell by a player with level 57 [[Magic]], enchanting 10 bolts per cast. This creates [[diamond dragon bolts (e)|enchanted diamond dragon bolts]], which are a superior version of [[diamond bolts (e)|enchanted diamond bolts]].
